title: Recall not working (PLEASE HELP)
body:
So I'm new to LoL, I just downloaded the game infact. I'm not new to MOBA's I've played a few, but I decided I might as well give League a try considering how large it is.

Anyways, I just downloaded the game and started the tutorial. But when it wanted me to recall back to base (which for me is the B key) it wouldn't work. I don't know why, because every other hotkey has worked just fine. But for some reason B, or anything I bind recall to, won't work. The icon for recall isn't even there. It's just a transparent circle with the letter 'B' next to it. I don't want to jump into any games before this gets fixed, so is it just a problem with the tutorial?

Running Mac OS X btw. I have already tried the whole deleting a file inside the Config folder but it still didn't fix anything. PLEASE help because I'm very interested in this game and would love to get into it. Thanks!

replies.body:
Try launching the legacy client
http://i.gyazo.com/9765d11f09457fa6e03af823cc9dda1f.png

When it's on this screen, click on the "?" in the top right corner.  Then in the help box, click "Repair."
I'd try out whatever Broporo suggests first though because my suggestion can (I think) reset your keybindings and other options you may have changed in the game.
